title: Announcements: Creating an Announcement
body:
Announcements: Creating an Announcement¶

To create a new announcement, follow the steps below.
Once your announcement has been created, you will be able to view it in the list of all announcements </users/platform/guides/announcements.html>`_ . You will now be able to customize the email .

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Platform

  3. Click Announcements

  4. Click in the upper right hand corner

  5. Enter a title

  6. Choose campaign recipients

    • Click the To field

    • Add a filter criteria

    • Click Done

  7. Enter a subject

  8. Click Save
